trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> types to UI Automation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer"></xref> for a data item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items"></xref> collection of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref>.
The data item that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
A new instance of the for item.
Returns an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified object.
The item to get an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> for.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified object.
Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.TreeItem"></xref> enumeration value.

Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren"></xref>.
This method is recursive.
That is, it returns the hierarchy of child objects of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>.
The collection of child elements.
Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName"></xref>.
A string that contains "TreeViewItem".

Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
One of the enumeration values.
If patternInterface is , , or , this method returns the current instance of the ; otherwise, it returns `null`.

`true` if the element is selected; otherwise `false`.
